mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category_tb( BNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER ) VALUES( 2 , #{title} , #{content} , #{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT place_id, place_name, place_address, tel_no, detail_information, open_hours, close_hours, buisness_day, shutdown_flag, category_detail as category_name, google_place_id, kakao_place_id, naver_place_id, latitude as y, longitude as x FROM places_tb where 1 = 1 and (place_name like '%' || #{place_name} || '%' or place_address like '%' || #{place_name} || '%' )
